Description: Oracle database access and management tools
Author: Micube MCP Framework

Tools.Name: Query
Tools.Description: Execute SELECT queries and return structured results with metadata. 이 도구는 설비의 상세한 정보 조회하는데 사용됩니다.

Parameters.Name: sql
Parameters.Description: SQL SELECT query to execute. Only SELECT and WITH statements are allowed. 이 파라미터를 사용하기 전에 반드시 실제 테이블이 존재하는지 확인하고 쿼리문을 만들어 주세요.

Tools.Name: Command
Tools.Description: Execute SQL commands (CREATE, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, etc.) that modify database structure or data

Parameters.Name: sql
Parameters.Description: SQL command to execute (DDL/DML). Dangerous commands like DROP DATABASE are blocked for safety.

Tools.Name: GetDatabaseInfo
Tools.Description: Retrieve comprehensive database schema information including tables, columns, indexes, and database metadata. 설비와 관련된 모든 데이터베이스의 메타 정보를 가져옵니다.

Tools.Name: TestConnection
Tools.Description: Test database connectivity and return connection status and performance metrics
